Text: This shit dont work the game crashes as soon as you press start button to start the game

This shit dont work the game crashes as soon as you press start button to start the game and I have a custom built PC with a Liquid Cooled Intel Core I7 2700k cpu running overclocked at 5.2 Ghz and 2 NVIDIA GeForce GTX 580's in Quad SLI mode so dont tell me my pc isn't good enough.

No, it does not seem to work. Pretty sure it is an issue when it tries to connect to the servers after pressing start. Tried a couple of different uploads and cracks, and the same thing happened. Other releases are experiencing the same things though. Thanks for the upload DibyaTPB, great work as always!

Let me add that it is actually hit or miss. Most of the time I get a CTD, however, on occasion the game will work past the connection screen and no problems. Nothing else that I have done to the firewall seems to lean it either way, but it does manage to start here and there.

Ok, last comment, I swear! Making sure my PeerBlock was off and running in Vista Service Pack 2 compatibility as well as running as administrator..and everything works 100%! Track editor does not work though. But the game is good so far, pretty fun!
worked ok for me.. shite game tho.. how could bugbear fuck up ridge racer.:(

If game crashes after pressing start, disconnect internet connection or block RRU.exe in your firewall settings.

For corrupted graphics in ATI cards just set all settings in catalyst to application controlled

OS:Windows XP, Vista SP2 32-bit, 7. [Windows up to date and latest service pack installed]
Processor: Pentium 4 3.0GHz or Athlon 64 3700+
